overview: Based on a true story of a young man who reluctantly enters the navy and becomes a diver to please his father, but later finds himself in the most dangerous spy mission of the Cold War. Elite US Navy saturation divers jockeying for a chance to dive in Soviet territorial waters. If you like a Christian adventure, diving, history, and good old-fashioned American bravado, you will enjoy this film!
title: God & Spies
